snippet: The election of Hassan Rowhani as president gives Iran and the United States an opportunity for new diplomatic engagement, which neither can afford to squander.
abstract: Editorial holds that election of Hassan Rouhani as Iran's next president creates opportunity to move forward on agreement to end country's nuclear weapons program and to repair decades of hostility with United States; expresses hope that Rouhani and Pres Obama will have necessary political skill and courage to move forward with fruitful negotiations.
lead_paragraph: The election of Hassan Rowhani as president gives Iran and the United States an opportunity for new diplomatic engagement, which neither can afford to squander.
